titleInfo.title: Configuring Poetic Time: Figures of Movement and Perception in Marcel Proust’s À la recherche du temps perdu
Vision in motion: streams of sensation and configurations time

bibliographicCitation.angewandte-chemie: B. R. Gibhardt, in Vision in motion: streams of sensation and configurations time (Ed.: M.F. Zimmermann), Diaphnes, Zürich, 2016, p. 361-374.
bibliographicCitation.bio1:
Gibhardt BR (2016)
Configuring Poetic Time: Figures of Movement and Perception in Marcel Proust’s À la recherche du temps perdu.
In: Vision in motion: streams of sensation and configurations time. Zimmermann MF (Ed); Zürich: diaphnes: 361-374.
